text: Since the DefaultSamplerCreator is used when parsing browser requests during recording, it should set the "Browser-compatible headers" option to true.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1577613
Log:
 DefaultSamplerCreator should set BrowserCompatible Multipart true
Bugzilla Id: 56263
